hero.mainHeading: Your Partner in Software Engineering & Outsourcing.
hero.subtitle: We build world-class digital products and provide top talent to help your business grow and scale.

whyConnector.heading: Why The Connector?
whyConnector.description: We are The Connector, a company built on trust, strategy, and execution. With a foundation in global consulting, we now focus on two pillars: Software Engineering and Outsourcing. Our strength lies in doing them exceptionally well—crafting secure, future-ready digital solutions and connecting businesses with the right talent at the right time.
whyConnector.tagline: Connecting Businesses to Software & Talent That Scale

services.title: Software Engineering
services.description: We build **secure, future-ready digital solutions** that help your business grow. From modern applications to scalable platforms, our engineering expertise ensures technology drives your success.

services.title: Outsourcing
services.description: We connect companies with the **right talent at the right time**. Our outsourcing solutions offer flexibility, reliability, and scalability—empowering businesses to expand without limits.

cta.heading: Let's Build Something Extraordinary Together
cta.description: Whether it's software, design, or full outsourcing — we're here to make it happen.

hero.heading: Let's Connect With The Connector
hero.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Fill out the form below or reach us through any of our channels.

form.header: Fill in your details and our team will reach out to you shortly.

hero.heading: Software Engineering That Powers Growth
hero.description: We are The Connector, a company built on trust, strategy, and execution. Our Software Engineering services craft secure, future-ready digital solutions tailored to your business, helping you scale efficiently and stay ahead in a competitive market.

whyConnector.heading: Why Choose Us?
whyConnector.description: We are The Connector, a company built on trust, strategy, and execution. Our clients choose us because we deliver secure, future-ready software and connect businesses with top talent at the right time. Every solution we create is tailored to drive growth, efficiency, and scalability.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: We create fast, scalable, and visually stunning websites that turn visitors into customers and help your business grow online.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: We build intuitive, high-performance apps for iOS and Android that engage users and keep them connected to your brand.

services.title: Cybersecurity
services.description: Stay ahead of threats with our cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions, designed to protect your data, users, and business reputation.

services.title: Artificial Intelligence
services.description: Harness the future with AI-powered automation and insights that drive smarter decisions and unlock new opportunities.

projects.title: PodMedia
projects.description: A leading podcast and media platform delivering high-quality audio and video content for creators and brands.

projects.title: OneTake
projects.description: Autonomous video editing platform that transforms raw footage into polished, shareable content instantly.

projects.title: Venttat
projects.description: Providing seamless and efficient public transportation solutions for a modern commuting experience.

hero.heading: Scale Smarter with Outsourcing Excellence
hero.description: Focus on your business, while we handle the tech, talent, and delivery.

whyConnector.heading: Why Choose Us?
whyConnector.description: We are The Connector, a company built on trust, strategy, and execution. Our clients choose us because we deliver secure, future-ready software and connect businesses with top talent at the right time. Every solution we create is tailored to drive growth, efficiency, and scalability.

services.title: Staff Augmentation
services.description: Scale your team with top-tier developers, designers, and engineers. We provide skilled professionals on-demand, so you can stay agile and meet project goals faster.

services.title: IT Outsourcing
services.description: Focus on your business while we handle the tech. Our outsourcing solutions deliver cost-efficient, reliable, and scalable IT services tailored to your needs.

services.title: Flexible Engagement
services.description: From short-term tasks to long-term partnerships, we offer flexible engagement models that adapt to your business workflow.

services.title: Dedicated Teams
services.description: Build a dedicated offshore team fully aligned with your vision. We take care of recruitment, management, and delivery — you focus on growth.

steps.title: Staff Augmentation
steps.description: Extend your in-house team with top-tier developers who blend seamlessly into your workflow.

steps.title: Global Talent
steps.description: Access skilled professionals worldwide, ready to work in your timezone and deliver results.

steps.title: Scalable Solutions
steps.description: Scale your team up or down on demand without the hassle of recruitment or overhead costs.

steps.title: Let's Get Started
steps.description: Whether outsourcing a project or augmenting your staff, we've got you covered.
